price: ߤߊ߲߫ ߸ ߡߐ߰ ߖߎ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߟߍߙߊ ߦߋ߫ ߔߊ߬ߔߊߟߌ߬ߔߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
